ModMetaData.name: Stonecutting Extended
ModMetaData.author: Scherub
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds learning XP for stonecutting again, as well as bulk recipes, cutting three chunks at once.
- Adds bulk bills: 3 chunks at once. - Allows you to gain XP again. - Adjustable Work Amount. - Select Crafting or Artistic as used skill
